In this way, this karma, until the time of death, when the final consciousness ceases, manifests in the mind as thoughts of past actions.
Great King!
When this person sees this, his mind becomes anxious and afraid. His own karma is exhausted, and different karma manifests.
Great King!
It is like remembering things in a dream upon awakening from a dream.
In this way, Great King!

The final consciousness is the dominant factor, and due to the causes and conditions of karma, by these two conditions, consciousness first arises in the stage of birth, either in hell, or as an animal, or in the realm of Yama, or in the realm of asuras, or among humans and gods.
When the previous consciousness ceases, the consciousness of birth arises, and the continuity of the stage of birth is uninterrupted.
Great King!
